Name: Amazing Joes Journey
About the game: Amazing Joe's Journey is a simple point & click browser game. A main character is Joe who landed in forest on his flying carpet and wants to find a treasure. It's placed at an island and Joe needs a boat. It's not easy to get a boat and first Joe needs to go thru some adventures. Will he succeed? That depends on you, (Game is smooth), Amazing Joe's Journey is 4th game from ATA games studio. We are making games for 5 years for you. Enjoy!
